title: Velvet Is the Night
description: To save her family from the guillotine, proud Claire Deveraux would do anything - even stike a devil's bargain with the ruthless new commissioner, Phillipe Dehet. Though an innocent, the breathtaking beauty has no illusions about what she has just promised...to surrender herself, body and soul, and become sensual prisoner to Duhet's every whim of pleasure.
author: Elizabeth Thornton
